tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Mansi Arora and her team at Dental Care n Cure  clinic are beyond amazing!  The clinic is taking all necessary precautions and follow all SOPs for nCOVID 19 . The appointments are slotted in such a way that there will be no 2 patients at one given time. The enforces the COVID 19 protocols.

Dr Arora is extremely professional  yet friendly  and was  attentive to my dental issues. She was  thorough in explaining the procedures and calmly answered all my queries. She gave me best advice for my dental problems.   Due to her steady hand  and attention to details during the procedure, I always felt at ease at the dentist's chair.

She even called and enquired about  well being of me  & my family when I was quarantined due to nCOVID 19. She would also intermittently ask if there is any extreme pain during the treatment. Her empathetic nature  was also  one of the reasons I was confident enough to get treated for all my ailing teeth at her clinic. I went through 3 RCTs with crowns and 1 tooth filling in matter of 2 months due to the same.

Also the rates for the clinical procedures and crowns are at par with the other top class dentists in the area. She will only recommend the best and won't pursue you to spend extra and unnecessary money on dental procedures.

It took me a while to find a doctor that made me feel comfortable and welcomed. I wish she was my general physician as well ! Good Luck !

Regards... Shashwat
reply_text: Thank u for such wonderful  words of appreciation . They motivate us to serve even better

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Cleaning,Dental Fillings,
review:
I was in very bad condition and suffering from acute pain for 1 month because my RCT (root canal treatment) was ill-treated by some other dental surgeon. After founding good google reviews, met Dr Mansi. She examined the complete situation patiently and explained the next course of treatment. She has re-treated my RCT and in 3 sessions she cured my pain and filled the roots very professionally. She further examined my complete teeth and informed well in advance, possibility of cavity formation at three places. Out of 2 fillings one was very tricky and complicated (below the gums) for which she used the laser. She handled overall treatment in a very professional manner with minimum pain and fast recovery. The quality of crowns which were fixed after RCT was excellent and adjusted immediately. The clinic is wonderful and waiting time is nil with proper appointment. Dr Mansi is very soft-spoken and shows patience with patients. She further suggested cleaning of teeth which was done by Dr Jyoti with complete care and without any pain.
I found both Dr Mansi and Dr Jyoti very professional and cooperative and I have no hesitation to recommend both of them.üëçüòä
reply_text: Thank you for this wonderful review. This was very encouraging

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently visited Dr. Mansi's clinic for a dental issue and I am so glad that I did! She was incredibly patient, understanding, and kind throughout the entire process. She took the time to explain everything in detail and made sure that all of my questions were answered before leaving her office. Her sweet nature put me at ease right away as I had been very afraid of visiting a dentist beforehand. Thanks to her knowledge about dental issues, she dispelled many myths which further increased my trust in her abilities as a doctor. Overall, it has been an amazing experience with Dr Mansi Arora - one which will stay with me for years to come!
reply_text: Thanks a bunch Bhawna. Your kind words really touched my heart. Am so grateful that u appreciate what efforts we do to make your experience a pleasant one!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been to dentists in the past, but this was so much better in every way. First of all the appointments are managed in such a way that you won‚Äôt have to wait, which was very convenient. Dr Mansi herself and her staff are some of the best in this profession. I went for a general checkup and cleaning, which was done with utmost precision and excellence. The best part was after the cleaning, the doctor gave us her undivided attention and explained everything that was to be done along with the precautions to be taken. Would highly recommend their commendable services.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had to get my existing tooth cap replaced with a better one. I explained my issue to Dr. Mansi and she listened to my concern patientlyc and came up with the best possible solution to make my smile better. The doctor also made sure whether I was satisfied with the overall procedure or not and asked for any betterment or correction once they showed me the new cap. I was pretty satisfied with the overall treatment and would highly appreciate Dr. Mansi for enhancing my smile. I would also like to mention Dr. Jyoti, who helped me with the scaling process and did it professionally, keeping in mind all my problem areas. I highly recommend this clinic and the doctors for any teeth related issues.
reply_text: Thank you for appreciating  our efforts to give you that smile you were looking for. Hope to keep providing  you quality treatment  in future as well.

review:
I wen to the clinic for my root canal treatment but was quite apprehensive about the pain and the success of the treatment but once met Dr Mansi Arora, her way of explaining the treatment procedures and professional yet warm way of explaining was very reassuring and when actually  the treatment started  she tried to make every sitting as painless as possible. 
I really am satisfied with my treatment and the professional yet warm way of assuring a patient by Dr Mansi and all her colleagues and of course the paramedics also working at the clinic. 
It‚Äôs a clean spacious clinic and all the Covid protocols are being followed very cautiously . 
I wish all the success to Dr Mansi Arora and dental care and cure clinic .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Oh she's great. I think you'll definitely be satisfied by her knowledge and work. Things to note while booking a dentist's appointment: 

- Always go to a specialist. She has a post graduate degree (prosthodontist). That is very important. 

- The other consultants who visit Mansi's clinic are also qualified for their work. She has ensured that all your dental needs can be covered by her team (the Dental Care N Cure Family) in one clinic. 

- COVID is a big issue these days. If you are going for dental treatment, as your respiratory system (mouth & nose) are going to be exposed, you want to ensure safety. When you visit once, you'll realize that she has done everything possible to ensure safety. 

- Don't bargain, support local clinics. Local businesses have been hit hard.
reply_text: Thanks a ton for the detailed feedback.
